products.title: Tiger Lager Beer
products.desc: Award-winning full flavored Tiger Lager Beer is a pale lager brewed from a special tropical lagering. Modification of the fermentation process counteracts the high humidity in equatorial Asia to yield a fresher lasting brew, rich in flavor, superior in quality. A lot goes into every can of Tiger: the finest malt, hops, and yeast, and over 200 quality checks and a strict brewing process that takes over 500 hours - little wonder it is world acclaimed!

products.title: Tiger Lager Beer - Case
products.desc: An award-winning full flavored pale lager, brewed with special tropical lagering processes

products.title: Corona Extra Beer
products.desc: Enjoy Corona Extra for its unmistakable color, one-of-a-kind taste, and unparalleled flavor of relaxation. This refreshing and full flavoured beer is imported from Mexico.

products.title: Heineken Lager Beer - Case
products.desc: Enjoy the fresh, cold, quality taste, now the World's No. 1 International Premium Beer!

products.title: Sapporo Premium Draft Beer
products.desc: With a lush use of aromatic hops and quality malt, Sapporo Draft Beer gives you a relaxing and refreshing flavor. It has an amazingly crisp and refreshing taste, a refined bitterness, and leaves a clean finish. A beer that's great for good times at home or out on the town.

products.title: Fat Bird Sauvignon Blanc
products.desc: Vintage may vary. A light New Zealand Sauvignon Blanc with all the characters you've grown to love. Typical lime zest, passionfruit & herbaceous characters. Bit of gooseberry fruitiness and a balanced zesty crisp finish

products.title: Anchor Smooth Pilsener Beer
products.desc: Enjoy the crisp, smooth and refreshing taste of Anchor Smooth Pilsener Beer. Since 1933, premium quality Anchor Beer has been brewed in the European Pilsen tradition using the finest quality hops to give you a smoother taste.

products.title: Heineken Lager Beer
products.desc: Fresh, cold, quality Heineken Lager Beer has been enjoyed around the world since 1873. First brewed in Holland, Heineken is now the World's No. 1 International Premium Beer!

products.title: Somersby Apple Cider
products.desc: A refreshingly crisp cider with a delicious, juicy and original apple flavor; made in Sweden

products.title: Erdinger Weissbrau Weibier
products.desc: Erdinger Weissbrau Weibier is a classic wheat beer made with fine yeast. This famous Bavarian specialty is brewed according to an age-old recipe and is still bottle-fermented in the traditional way. Only the finest ingredients, years of experience, and constant quality checks guarantee the beer's unmistakable flavor.

products.title: Little Creatures Pale Ale
products.desc: Little Creatures Pale Ale is brewed in Australia using direct sourced hops to create an intense citrus and grapefruit aroma and flavour. We balance the taste of this refreshing pale ale with a careful selection of specialty malts and a local pale malt.

products.title: Hoegaarden Wit-Blanche Original
products.desc: Hoegaarden Wit-Blanche Original is a distinctive and unfiltered Belgian wheat beer. With an aroma of orange peel, coriander, and spice, its characteristic taste is entirely unique: smooth, light-bodied, and simultaneously sweet and sour, with a subtle, spiced citrus flavour.

products.title: Two Oceans Sauvignon Blanc
products.desc: Vintage may vary. Crisp, fresh and elegant with upfront tropical fruit, tangy gooseberry, a hint of green fig and fresh-cut grass. This wine has become a favourite in 80 countries. Pair it with grilled seafood, bouillabaisse, pasta and poultry dishes.

products.title: Hipi Sauvignon Blanc
products.desc: This is an intense Sauvignon Blanc, bursting with luscious tropical fruit flavours.  Serve this wine chilled, and drink within 2-3 years of vintage to maintain the fruit intensity.

products.title: Pure Blonde Premium Beer
products.desc: Pure Blonde Premium Beer is a light, crisp, aromatic lager that delivers a superior taste. It has been specially brewed longer to produce a beer that is low in carbohydrates. It is pure in taste with nothing artificial.

products.title: Tiger Radler
products.desc: Tiger Radler is a new variant of Tiger Lager that combines century-old tradition with modern day innovation. Made with Tiger Beer and natural lemon juice, Tiger Radler offers Double Refreshment. Naturally cloudy and free from additives, Tiger Radler has a brand new taste that is fruity and sharp whilst still being rooted in beer.

products.title: Stella Artois Premium Lager Beer
products.desc: Stella Artois Premium Lager Beer has been brewed in Leuven, Belgium in the same tradition that can be traced back to 1366, using only the finest hops and malted barleys.

products.title: Fat Bird Merlot
products.desc: This wine is jam packed with fresh berries.  Smooth and rich with supple tannins and well integrated French oak.  Vintage may vary.

products.title: Erdinger Weissbrau Dunkel
products.desc: Erdinger Weissbrau Dunkel is a dark, rich, and smooth wheat beer. This famous Bavarian specialty is brewed according to an age-old recipe and owes its full-bodied flavor to the fine hops and dark malt used in its production. Years of brewing experience coupled with state-of-the-art technology guarantee its excellent quality and taste.

products.title: Kirin Original Brew Draft Beer
products.desc: Kirin Original Brew Draft Beer is made with a luxurious single wort (or first press) brewing process which extracts only the purest, most flavorful portion of the finest ingredients. When combined with its new all malt formula, the result is a distinctively smooth, clean, and full-bodied beer — yet with none of the bitter aftertaste one would expect from a beer with this much flavor. Kirin's Original Brew is refreshing and satisfying, and 100% Brewed for Good Times.

products.title: Cerveza Sol
products.desc: Cerveza Sol is a light, festive and refreshing blond pilsner-style beer from Mexico. It has a fresh malty, fruity-lemony flavor and a soft, quenching dry finish. It is excellent when served chilled and drunk in the long neck bottle garnished with a fresh wedge of lime in the neck to accentuate the floral citrusy aroma of the beer. It is wonderful with lemony dishes like salads, fish, and chicken satay or spicy food like nachos, tacos or Thai dishes, or summer barbecues.

products.title: Leffe Blond Beer
products.desc: Leffe Blond Beer is an authentic Belgian abbey beer. It is elegant, smooth and fruity with a spicy aftertaste and a hint of bitter orange. It gets its light, sunny color from the use of pale malt and is excellent with meals or as a thirst quenching aperitif.

products.title: Hipi Pinot Noir
products.desc: Hipi Pinot Noir has concentrated black cherry and dark berry aromas which follow through to the palate where dark berry-fruit and cherry flavours are supported by soft tannins.  This is a ripe and deeply coloured food wine, designed for early drinking but capable of cellaring for 3-5 years.

products.title: Long Flat Semillion Sauvignon Blanc
products.desc: Vintage may vary. From Australia; an unwooded style full of fresh fruit characteristics and a refreshing, natural tang

products.title: Kopparberg Premium Elderflower & Lime Cider

Developed over 200 years ago for global export from Ireland, the addition of extra hops ensured this stout would arrive to its destination in perfect condition.

products.title: Two Oceans Semillon Chardonnay
products.desc: Vintage may vary. Crisp and dry with a fresh acidity and a lingering aftertaste of citrus and vanilla.

products.title: Long Flat Pink Moscato

products.title: Kangaroo Ridge Cabernet Sauvignon

products.title: Hardys Wines Stamp of Australia Cabernet Merlot
products.desc: Vintage may vary. From Australia; vibrant with ripe berry and plum fruit flavours and a soft, sweet oak background

products.title: Two Oceans Pinotage

products.title: Gordon's London Dry Gin

products.title: Trappistes Rochefort 6 Beer

As brewing is still non-commercialised to date, Trappist beers are available in very limited quantity and are highly coveted by enthusiasts. Enjoy every precious drop! Contains 7.5% alcohol content.

products.title: Kilkenny Irish Beer

Each can contains a new floating widget to give Kilkenny an even smoother taste and creamier head.

products.title: Tiger Lager Beer Bottle - Case

Since the mid-1980s, a greater attention has been paid to fruit ripeness, resulting in a wine that is fuller in style and structure. Colour: Bright Plum red. Nose: Perfume high notes propelled by glaceed cherry. A spike of choco-mint reminds instantly of its regional source. Palate: Freshness and vivacity, pomegranate & cumquat inducing acidity. Camphor and spice binding the with the French oak. Grippy tannins with a long and lingering finish. Vintage may vary.

products.title: Carlsberg Lager
products.desc: By appointment to the Royal Danish Court. Carlsberg is a Pilsner style lager originating from Copenhagen, Denmark. Carlsberg is light, easy drinking and refreshing. The all malt recipe and Carlsberg yeast strain gives the balance between body and depth of flavour and a clean refreshing palate. When Carlsberg first imported it's lager from Copenhagen to the UK in 1868, it was a distinctive 12 pointed star that it used as its trade mark. Carlsberg's founder, J.C. Jacobsen created this star as as the first trademark of his brewery, which was inspired by a 6 pointed star that has stood for quality since the middle ages. This pointed Brewer's star remains an icon of premium lager for Carlsberg today. The Star even sits over the gates of the original brewery in Copenhagen as a constant reminder to continue to strive for quality in everything we do.

Nose: Savoury notes quickly hits - gravy/pan juices and vegemite/soy. Fruits emit thereafter. Waft of cocoa powder and hint of vanilla. Palate: Medium-bodied.
